name: Athirasa (New Year Pancakes)
description: Sweet rice pancakes fried until puffed
instructions: Melt jaggery in water and strain
Mix rice flour with jaggery syrup
Flatten small balls into thin discs
cultural_notes: Must rest overnight for best puffing
description_sinhala: පැණිරස බත් පෑන්කේක් පිම්බෙන තෙක් බදින ලද
description_tamil: இனிப்பு அரிசி அப்பத்தை கொப்பளிக்கும் வரை வறுக்கவும்
cultural_notes_sinhala: හොඳම පිම්ම සඳහා එක රැයකින් විවේක ගත යුතුය
cultural_notes_tamil: Must rest overnight for best puffing
